name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter Facebook Ads by video length

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find ads in Facebook Ad Library with a video longer than a specified duration. Filter search results by video length

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool highlighting or hiding Ads in Facebook Ad library according to the duration of the included video. Optionally ads with video shorter than specified in the options minimal length get hidden. Highlighting and hiding is reversible.
